Format: Vinyl Record LP, Chrysalis Records. UK release from 1984. Soul music LP release from Sylvester. Classic Electro Soul Funk music LP. First or early UK pressing with A//1 and B//1 in run out grooves.

This is the most delectable, passionate disco music, better than most of today's dance music. Sylvester had a wonderful falsetto voice that is carried along on the most infectious dance beats. In the late 1970s he was as popular as Donna Summer and ruled the dance charts.
